default-mode-light.$description: Default application background color. Should be set to either html or body element.

default-mode-dark.$description: Default application background color. Should be set to either html or body element.

backdrop-mode-light.$description: Background on overlay used with modals

backdrop-mode-dark.$description: Background on overlay used with modals

default-mode-light.$description: Default application surface color. Use this for e.g. card backgrounds.

default-mode-dark.$description: Default application surface color. Use this for e.g. card backgrounds.

hover-mode-light.$description: Bakcground color for hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items hover state background.

hover-mode-dark.$description: Bakcground color for hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items hover state background.

selected-mode-light.$description: Bakcground color for selected state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected state background.

selected-mode-dark.$description: Bakcground color for selected state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected state background.

selected-hover-mode-light.$description: Bakcground color for selected-hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected-hover state background.

selected-hover-mode-dark.$description: Bakcground color for selected-hover state of surfaces. Example: dropdown items selected-hover state background.

inverse-mode-light.$description: Background color for containers that use an inverse bg color. (eg: Tooltips)

inverse-mode-dark.$description: Background color for containers that use an inverse bg color. (eg: Tooltips)

brand-mode-light.$description: Brand color. For use on primary links.

brand-mode-dark.$description: Brand color. For use on primary links.

on-color-mode-light.$description:
Text on interactive colors;
Text on button colors

on-color-mode-dark.$description:
Text on interactive colors;
Text on button colors

default.$description: 6px. Default border radius for UI components

small.$description: 2px. Small border radius for UI components

large.$description: 8px. Large border radius for UI components

focus-offset.$description: Border radius for focus borders that use an offset from their parent elements that use border-radius-default (Inputs, cards, buttons etc)

global.$description: A global box-shadow token allowing to apply a custom box-shadow to all pertaining components. By default its value is set to 'none' but if your brand's theme requires more elevation (shadows), feel free to modify the value of this token accordingly.
